ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: All you hit is Tab - Hotkey - Tab and it will heal yourself and not the enemy. Trust me I have done it many times. Anyways u can t heal an NPC. Well it
ygData.messageBody:
All you hit is "Tab - Hotkey - Tab" and it will heal yourself and not the enemy.
Trust me I have done it many times. Anyways u can't heal an NPC. Well it works.

XxKommiexX@... wrote:

> From: XxKommiexX@...
>
> So as long as you casted the heal while you targeted yourself, it will still
> heal yourself? It won't heal the monster, even though, when the spell is done
> casting, the monster is targeted? Or do you have to wait until it is done
> casting on you, for it to work?
